info.description:
THE STORY ABOUT THIS CHAIR.
It all started with an idea on how to merge two curved veneer shells together using only the classic ways 
of moulded veneer production and minmal fixings. Scandinavian stained ash or oak veneer, on a base of solid wood is selected with the ambition to communicate a contemporary yet classic design, assuring a long lasting life. This chair is meant for many purposes and scenes. Neat enough for the kitchen scene, comfortable for the home office and it embraces you at fine dining moments.

”A finedininghomeofficekitchenchair” OSCAR HAKEBERG
info.name: Hakeberg Chair
